member.name: T:DataStorage
member.summary: DataStorage is used to persist and retrieve employee data from the files.

member.name: M:DataStorage.Store(Employee)
member.summary: Save an employee object to a file named with the Employee name.
member.remarks:
This method uses
in addition to
member.param: The employee to persist to a file

members.member:
Loads up an employee object
This method uses
in addition to
The first name of the employee
The last name of the employee
The employee object corresponding to the names
January 1, 2000*
